oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Dia!kwain's brother (Ko-boken) is standing up at dawn, despite warnings against doing so from his father. A little whirlwind, or !ho, comes and pushes him over and he staggers and has to lie down. 1) p.5561v: this story is taken from Dia!kwain's personal experiences, 2) pp.5561v-5568v: see The !ho, 3) pp.5569v-5570v: see Gargling, 4) See also The !kh'o: a blue mist which resembles smoke and The !ho, 5) This story is found in Book V-20.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The !ho and Ko-boken
